Article.ArticleTitle: Evaluation of the learning effect on the 6-min walk distance in adults with long COVID.

Abstract.AbstractText: There was no learning effect found on 6-min walk distance (6MWD) in patients with long COVID, performing a 6-min walk test twice. However, considerable variation in the difference between the two 6MWDs was observed: only 51% showed an increase. https://bit.ly/3H70G1r.
